groups.doc: Optogenetic stimulus.  The data[] field is in unit of watts.

links.doc: link to OptogeneticStimulusSite group that describes the site to which this stimulus was applied
links.name: site

attributes.doc: Value is 'Metadata about an optogenetic stimulus site'
attributes.name: help
attributes.value: Metadata about an optogenetic stimulus site

groups.doc: One of possibly many groups describing an optogenetic stimulation site. COMMENT: Name is arbitrary but should be meaningful. Name is referenced by OptogeneticSeries
